\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[bdaa1ecf3fa8155d28a7b8b9e57d6782]%mdk

\[%mdk-data-line={156}
\left\{\begin{array}{l}
x = a \mod m\\
x = b \mod n\\
x = c \mod k.
\end{array}\right.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
